content: Curios items in Black Myth: Wukong can't be upgraded, so you can't increase their power or potency. Therefore, the Mani Bead will stay at its current power throughout the game. If you want a better buff or something else to fit your build, you will need to switch it out.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mani_Bead.md', within the main section titled 'Mani Bead'.
The content is as follows:
Curios items in Black Myth: Wukong can't be upgraded, so you can't increase their power or potency. Therefore, the Mani Bead will stay at its current power throughout the game. If you want a better buff or something else to fit your build, you will need to switch it out.
